channel.title: CVE Feed for HasThemes -- HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 )
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HasThemes -- HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 )

item.title: CVE-2024-29094|2024-03-19T16:38:15.372Z -- HasThemes -- HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 )
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 ) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 ): from n/a through 1.1.7.
